remarks: Composition of a function with a function abstraction.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Dec-2014.)
statement:
fnopabco.1 $e |- ( x e. A -> B e. C ) $.
fnopabco.2 $e |- F = { <. x , y >. | ( x e. A /\ y = B ) } $.
fnopabco.3 $e |- G = { <. x , y >. | ( x e. A /\ y = ( H ` B ) ) } $.
fnopabco $p |- ( H Fn C -> G = ( H o. F ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d C x y $.
$d H x y $.
